text: @WhiteHouse Self-validation of tests!? #CoronaTrump is 'flooding the market' with unauthorised, potentially dodgy #Covid19 tests with potential for worrying false-positives and harmful false-negatives. On top of his own disinformation, #Trump's industrialising manufacture of misinformation
